name: Wizard's Adventure
description:
As a wizard, you are pretty powerful, you also have a pretty powerful apatite! This games takes you on an adventure from a dark dungeon, to a lush forest, to a brisk and beautiful mountain top!

This game is filled with platforming and plenty of magic missiles,  but the best part of any story is the people you meet along the way!

This game is complete. you can play though the entire game, but I still will most likely be adding a few more final touches, and possibly a hardcore mode! please leave some feedback and let me know how I did! spent the entire summer learning Unity and although its not perfect, I am pretty proud of the work!

DISCLAIMER: Most of the assets here I made by hand, however! the Forest tileset and the mountain tileset are both from the amazing 

aamatniekss (https://aamatniekss.itch.io/deep-forest-pixel-tileset) (Forest)

shackhal (https://shackhal.itch.io/multi-platformer-tileset) (Winter/Mountain)

I have learned a lot about pixel art but I could not come close to how amazing their work was, I edited theirs slightly to fit my style more but they did all the heavy lifting there!
